title: Anyone know why I got this icon
body: Today i randomly got on, and i saw that i got two icons, but i dont know for what reason i got these icons, any explanation would be nice

replies.body: Lew's info is spot on here.  Thanks for helping out with testing!  Let me know if you have any questions!
They are from playing poro king during snowdown 2016 and for being a alpha client tester.
